emailauth-email-body-intro: $1, it looks like you are trying to log in from a new device on $2.
emailauth-email-body-warning: This code is required to access your account. It will expire in $1. For your security, do not share it with anyone.
emailauth-email-body-attack-p1: This email was sent because someone attempted to log in to your account. The login attempt included your correct account name and password.
emailauth-email-body-attack-p2: If this was not you, you should change your password now.
emailauth-login-message: You need to verify your login. A verification code has been sent to your email address ($1), please enter that code here.
emailauth-login-help: Contact the [[{{int:grouppage-sysop}}|site administrators]] if you no longer have access to your account's email address. ([[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:EmailAuth|more information]])
emailauth-accountrecovery-logged-in: This page is not available for logged-in users. If you need to recover an account, please log out first.
emailauth-accountrecovery-success: Your account recovery request has been submitted successfully. Our Trust & Safety team will review your request and contact you at the email address you provided.
emailauth-accountrecovery-confirmation-n: A confirmation email has been sent to the contact email address you provided. To complete your account recovery request, you must click the link in the email.
emailauth-accountrecovery-confirmation-s: Confirm your request to recover your account
emailauth-accountrecovery-confirmation-b:
We have received a request to recover the account named "$1" on {{SITENAME}}.

To continue with this process, click the link below to verify your email address. The link will expire in $2.

$3

If this wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email, and no changes will be made to your account.
emailauth-accountrecovery-confirmation-r: This confirmation link has expired. A new confirmation link has been sent to the contact email address you provided. Please click this new link to complete your account recovery request.
emailauth-accountrecovery-email-mismatch: The email addresses you entered do not match. Please check and try again.
emailauth-accountrecovery-invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
emailauth-accountrecovery-rate-limited: You have submitted too many account recovery requests. Please wait before trying again.
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-generic: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-invalid-: The information you provided could not be processed. Please check your entries and try again.
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-service-: The account recovery service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-badtoken:
Invalid confirmation link.
The link may have expired.
emailauth-accountrecovery-disabled: Account recovery is not available on this wiki. Please contact the site administrators for assistance.
